nodes.text: Ghana Gleemort was a Gamorrean guard who worked for the Hutt crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure in his palace on the desert planet Tatooine. In the year 4 ABY, Gleemort was present in the palace when several members of Alliance to Restore the Republic arrived to rescue the smuggler Han Solo, who was Jabba's captive. Gleemort carried a Vibro-ax and wore brown armor.
